tn.text: Rehoboam was in control of the territories of Judah and Benjamin.

tn.ref: The priests and the Levites who were in all Israel went over to him

tn.ref: People from all the tribes of Israel came after them
tn.text: The people from the tribes belonging to the northern kingdom who still worshiped the Lord God fled to Judah.
